title: Item 2 Title
description: There were white out conditions in the town; subsequently, the roads were impassable.
txt: She wore green lipstick like a fashion icon.

title: Item 3 Title
description: It must be five o'clock somewhere.
txt: I think I will buy the red car, or I will lease the blue one.

title: Item 4 Title
description: All they could see was the blue water surrounding their sailboat.
txt: A glittering gem is not enough.

title: Item 5 Title
description: Joe made the sugar cookies; Susan decorated them.
txt: I caught my squirrel rustling through my gym bag.
